org.sd.crawl
Interface LinkFollower

All Known Implementing Classes:
HtmlLinkFollower
public interface LinkFollower

Interface for accepting/rejecting links to follow while crawling.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Nested Class Summary
static class LinkFollower.Priority
           
 
Method Summary
 boolean shouldFetchLink(SiteContext siteContext, SiteData siteData, Link link)
          Determine whether to fetch the given link.
 LinkFollower.Priority shouldFollowLink(SiteContext siteContext, SiteData siteData, Link link)
          Determine whether to follow links from the target of the given link.
 

Method Detail

shouldFetchLink

boolean shouldFetchLink(SiteContext siteContext,
                        SiteData siteData,
                        Link link)
Determine whether to fetch the given link.

Note that some links will only be fetched and not followed.

Returns:
true to fetch the destination url of the given link.

shouldFollowLink

LinkFollower.Priority shouldFollowLink(SiteContext siteContext,
                                       SiteData siteData,
                                       Link link)
Determine whether to follow links from the target of the given link.

Given that the link has been fetched, determine whether its links should be followed.

Returns:
null to NOT follow the links on the destination url of the given link; otherwise, return a NORMAL priority to follow in normal breadth-first fashion or HIGH priority to follow the link sooner.
